title: Chapter 2275 - Chapter 2275: Chapter 2275-Chaos Gems Found
body:
Chapter 2275 - Chapter 2275: Chapter 2275-Chaos Gems Found

Chapter 2275: Chapter 2275-chaos gems found

Translator: 549690339

Mo tianluo was incomparably powerful and brave. He struck out with his palm, which directly pierced through the void and broke through all the attacks of the young man in blue.

The blue-shirted young man’s expression changed drastically. He wanted to retreat and Dodge, but it was too late.

Bang!

The terrifying palm print hit the chest of the young man in blue. He screamed as his chest was pierced through. His body flew more than 10000 meters away and coughed up blood. He was seriously injured.

“No, that’s impossible!”

Updated on B0XƝ0VEL.COM

Someone from the heavenly realm shouted. It was hard to accept this.

The young man in blue was ranked in the top three among the nine unique youths in the heaven realm. His combat strength had reached the level of a rank 8 true Emperor. However, he was severely injured after only a few moves from the Prince of the foreign race.

The difference was too great!

More importantly, was it really as the foreign heavenly Emperor had said, that mo tianluo was only ranked ninth among the younger generation of the foreign races?

In that case, there was really no hope for the heaven realm!

When this generation of geniuses grew up, what they brought to the heaven realm would not be hope, but despair!

Many people roared, unwilling to accept all this.

They had waited for countless years, fought for countless years, and finally arrived at the golden age, the age of geniuses. This generation was destined to rise to the top and give birth to the most powerful experts.

Everyone was looking forward to the rise of this generation, and then they would kill their way back and take back the nine-heaven domain of the heaven realm.

However, this was the result that he had been waiting for.

Many people’s faces were pale. At this moment, their morale was completely gone.

What was the use of fighting and risking their lives?

“It’s not good!”

Heavenly venerate six sages sighed inwardly.

He knew that this was a huge blow to everyone, and the situation was not good for the heaven realm.

“Hahaha, the so-called Golden Age of the heaven realm is nothing more than this. You can’t even withstand a single blow. Do you still have any heaven’s favorites? All of you, come out and fight.”

One of the heaven’s favorites laughed. His laughter was filled with disdain and mockery.

Today, their goal had been successfully achieved.

The morale of the heaven’s favorites is low. After a period of time, they will definitely collapse.

there are still many geniuses from the heaven realm who are not in the two world city. Otherwise, they would not be weaker than you!

Heavenly venerate six sages spoke. At this point in time, he definitely couldn’t show weakness.

“Oh, really? Then I’ll give you time to send people to find the heaven’s favorites. I’m just afraid that the people you send will be too weak to withstand a single blow!”

The foreign celestial Thearch laughed.

go and find the top two of the nine uniques. This time, we can’t let our morale drop!

Heavenly venerate six sages sent a voice transmission to a heavenly Emperor.

“I’m just afraid that they have even more powerful chosen!”

The heavenly Emperor sighed.

I can’t care so much. Now, we can only fight!

The celestial said.

The heavenly Emperor nodded and left in a flash.

The non-humans stood still on the battlefield, waiting with calm and composed expressions.

At that moment, Lu Ming had ended his cultivation.

“I don’t have enough energy to break through to the true Emperor realm!”

Lu Ming sighed.

Although he had refined many world cores, he had only managed to rush to the peak of the seven-star illusionary Emperor stage. It was impossible for him to break through to the true Emperor stage unless he had a large number of chaos stones or primordial chaos stones.

forget it, I’ll continue to the battlefield of true emperors. With my current cultivation, I’m invincible in the periphery of the battlefield of true emperors. 1’11 hunt for some alien race essence crystals and Exchange them for chaos gems!

After making up his mind, Lu Ming exited the mountain and river diagram and flew out of two world city.

As they neared the city walls, Lu Ming felt that something was amiss. The atmosphere in two world city was extremely heavy and oppressive.

“There’s a big battle!”

Lu Ming did not need to think. He could guess that there must have been a huge battle.

When he arrived at the city wall, he found that many people’s eyes were filled with helplessness and despair, as if they had lost hope.

Lu Ming understood what had happened after asking around.

“A heaven’s favorite from another race? There’s also the Prince of the alien race. I’ve found the chaos gem!”

Lu Ming muttered to himself before his eyes suddenly lit up.

Lu Ming’s eyes swept across the city and saw the Heng Yu heavenly Emperor and the others on the city wall. He hurriedly walked toward them.

“Lu Ming!”

Heavenly Emperor Heng Yu sensed Lu Ming and smiled.

“Senior Hengyu, please let me out!”

Lu Ming said.

“You’re going out?”

Heavenly Emperor Heng Yu revealed a look of surprise.

“That’s right. I’m going to go and meet some outsider chosen!”

Lu Ming nodded.

“This…”

The Heng Yu heavenly Emperor and the other heavenly emperors looked at Lu Ming hesitantly.

Although Lu Ming’s talent was unprecedented since ancient times, he had just become a Martial Emperor not long ago. A few years ago, in the Alkaid ancient city, Lu Ming’s combat strength was not weak and he could defeat the Black Tortoise forest at that time.

But now, even though the Black Tortoise forest’s combat strength had improved greatly, they were still not a match for the foreign kind’s prodigy.

Even if Lu Ming’s progress was faster and he was stronger than the Black Tortoise forest, it was impossible for him to be a match for the alien Prince.

“Alright!”

However, the eternal universe heavenly Emperor only considered it for a moment before nodding in agreement.

Lu Ming had already created history. He had become a divine Emperor with many laws. It was unprecedented. No matter how fast Lu Ming improved, there was nothing to be surprised about.

There was a glimmer of hope in their eyes. They hoped that Lu Ming could defeat the alien race’s prodigy and restore the morale of the heaven realm.

The Heng Yu heavenly Emperor immediately ordered the formation to be opened and Lu Ming to leave.

Lu Ming’s figure flashed and he flew out of two world city.

Instantly, it attracted everyone’s attention.

“That is … Lu Ming!”

it’s him. It’s Lu Ming. Why is he out? is he going to fight with the alien race’s prodigy?”

before Lu Ming became a divine Emperor, he controlled many laws and even three ultimate laws. He defied the heavens and became a divine Emperor.

There has never been anyone like him in history. As soon as he became a divine Emperor, he rushed to the four-star void Emperor realm and suppressed the Black Tortoise forest. Now that a few years have passed, Lu Ming must be stronger. He might even be able to fight against the prodigies of the alien race!

Many people revealed hopeful expressions.

1 don’t think so. No matter how strong he is, he can’t be a match for the Prince of the alien race!

Someone poured cold water on the conversation.

He was an expert from the LAN family.

“Why Boost other people’s morale and destroy your own? you’ll know after the battle!”

Heavenly Emperor Heng Yu glanced at the LAN family’s expert and said coldly. The LAN family’s expert’s expression changed, and he didn’t dare to say anything.

Lu Ming moved as fast as lightning and arrived beside the six sages.

“Lu Ming!”

Heavenly venerate six sages and the others looked at Lu Ming and nodded.

“Senior, let me fight!”

Lu Ming said.

“You want to fight? What a joke, didn’t you see how strong the other party was? If you go, you’ll only make us lose one more battle and deal a greater blow to our morale!”

Xuanwu Lin said first.

“You’re a piece of trash, do you think others are like you?”

Lu Ming cast a disdainful glance at the Black Tortoise forest.

“You…”

The Black Tortoise forest’s face turned red, but he had indeed suffered a crushing defeat just now, and he couldn’t refute it.

“Lu Ming, fight with all your might!”

Said the sixth Saint.

Lu Ming nodded and stepped forward. As he walked in front, the aura of a seven-star illusionary Emperor completely burst out from his body.

“A seven-star illusionary Emperor? How did he improve so quickly?”

Black Tortoise Lin’s pupils contracted sharply as he roared in his heart in disbelief..
